result.execSummary:
The defendant Laura J Schneider was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Court ordered all waivable costs waived. Any remaining costs that cannot be waived are due by 03-17-17. Failure to pay will result in an immediate entry of a civil judgment ordered by the court.
Consecutive to: Any other sentence; Huber privileges for medical treatment ONLY. Court opposes electronic monitoring. Sentence to commence FORTHWITH

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Laura J Schneider

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.

AS TO COUNT 1:   Court ordered defendant to serve 50 days in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence with credit for 0 (zero) days time served.  Huber privileges for medical treatment ONLY.  Court opposes electronic monitoring.  Sentence to commence FORTHWITH.  Court ordered all waivable costs waived.  Any remaining costs that cannot be waived are due by 3/17/17.  Failure to pay will result in the immediate entry of a civil judgment ordered by the court.  Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Laura J Schneider in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Defendant Laura J Schneider in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: KAR.  Case calendared for plea/sentencing hearing.

AS TO COUNT 1:   Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  Defendant further advised that if she is not a US citizen deportation is possible.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court, defendant Laura J Schneider not in court, in custody and not produced.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for bail-bond hearing.   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER TO WCS  for supervision upon release for the Repeat Intoxicated Driver Program.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by SCRAM, drug tests and portable breathalyzers.   No use or possession of controlled substances without a valid prescription. No possession of dangerous weapons/firearms.   Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no contact with Barbara P.  or her residence

Defendant Laura J Schneider in court with attorney Michael Jude.  Defendant Laura J Schneider in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Laura J Schneider

Prior: 3136 South Toldt Parkway, West Allis, WI 53227
No reply from defendant or surety.  vp

COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendered for calendar call / projected guilty plea and sentencing.  Court ordered stayed warrant lifted. Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered Bench Warrant to be issued.   Court ordered any bail posted to be forfeited.
WCS Intoxicated Driver Intervention Program report dated June 11, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Attorney Adam c Essling in court.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing hearing. For reasons stated on the record,   Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next hearing.  Calendar call scheduled for June 11, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Laura J Schneider in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Katherine Halopka-Ivery appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   ENTRY MADE WITHOUT THE COURT FILE. Case in court due to violation.  Arguments heard as to bail. Court amends cash bail on case 15CT47.  Case remains calendared for plea/sentencing on 6/11/15 in Branch 37.
WCS Program Violation Report; Positive for cocaine; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant Laura J Schneider in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37. Court ordered defendant report to WCS program.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Laura J Schneider in court with attorney Adam c Essling.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Pre-trial conference held off the record.    Defense counsel has received discovery and offer, additional time needed to review with his client. Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 28, 2015 at 08:30 am.
WCS Intoxicated Driver Intervention Program dated February 20, 2015; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER TO WCS  for supervision upon release for the Repeat Intoxicated Driver Program.  ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY to be monitored by SCRAM, drug tests and portable breathalyzers.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Barbara P. or her residence

Defendant Laura J Schneider in court with attorney Christian Thomas Eichenlaub.  Defendant Laura J Schneider in custody.  Ronald Dague appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 20, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
